front.title: Examples of the 'XML2RFC' Version 2 and 3 Vocabularies

abstract.t: This document gives examples of use of the "XML2RFC" vocabulary. The examples cover both version 2 and version 3. The purposes of this draft it to give authors of Internet Drafts examples of how to use the XML vocabularies, and to show how use of the version 2 vocabulary will change with version 3.Editorial Note (To be removed by RFC Editor) Discussion of this draft takes place on the rfc-interest mailing list (rfc-interest@rfc-editor.org), which has its home page at [1].
